Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Turn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Turn
public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a turn of the game flow phase of the game. During each turn a player can perform only one normal action between TakeResourcesFromMarket, ActivateProduction and BuyDevCard. Afterwards he can activate or discard a leader card, or he can move the resources in his warehouse. The players that are not in turn can only see parts of the board without actively interacting with them.
